11.content: Will you be following the original dog, an Old English Sheepdog?
11.title: Boy

choices: You put the ring back in you pocket
You leave the ring on and head outside.
1121.content:
You return home from a hard day's work at the Meuseam, working on setting up a new exhibit. As you walk to your door, you see the Standard Poodle from the rich family next door, whose name is Beauty. You've always envied that dog. She gets pampered all day by those rich owners of hers. Your Mom doesn't mind dogs, but she thinks keepng one is too much work. You head inside the house.

You take off your work uniform and you hear a clank on the ground. You look down and see a ring! Uh oh, you think, you know it's from the exhibit, it must of fallen into your pocket. You examine the ring and decide to put it on. You see something inscribed into it.

"Incanis Corpore Transmuto"

You don't know what it means, nor do you care. What do you do now?
1121.title: Poodle

11211.content:
You toss the ring aside, thinking it was a cheap souvenir.

After a long day at work, you look forward to a good night's sleep. After a shower, you lay down on your bed and are out cold.

The sunlight shining through the blinds awakens you the following morning. You wish you could get a few more hours of sleep, but your mom opens the door.

"Honey, it's time to get ready for school." she says.

The rest of the morning was a haze as you try to wake from your slumber. You get dressed, have some breakfast and catch the bus to school.

By the time you reach school, you are finally starting to wake up. That's a good thing as the bell rings for the start of your first period....
11211.title: You toss the ring aside

choices: You ask the teacher to be excused
You try your best to make it through class
112111.content:
Everything seems normal as class begins. Normally art class was a breeze. The teacher would show the students a work of art and ask them to recreate it. Art was never your best subject, but the teacher was rather forgiving as long as you tried.

Today the teacher gave the students a real challenge. She showed the students a replica of one of Monet's paintings. It was an incredible painting with many colors and details.

As you take out your painting supplies, a burning sensation enters your eyes. When you look down at your paint set and try organizing them in rainbow order you realize that you couldn't tell red from green and soon all of the colors looked the same. As you look around, you notice everything now appears in black and white.
112111.title: Art

choices: You are playing Basketball in the gym
112112.content:
You head to the Gym Locker Room, and see all your friends and your gym teacher, Mr. Vindon. Mr. Vindon announces what you are doing today as you go to change.

What are you doing in Gym?
112112.title: Gym

choices: You start to feel really warm
1121121.content:
As you enter the locker room, a pain rips across your chest, abdomen and groin. You try to find an isolated corner to see what is happening.

With some difficulty, you lift your shirt and can only watch in horror as six nipples grow across your chest.

"I've got teats!" You think in horror as the sensation in your groin and abdomen intensify. Without looking, you are sure other changes have taken place as well. You quickly put on your gym uniform and run out onto the basketball court before Mr Vindon comes in and yells at you.

You begin to play when...
1121121.title: You are playing Basketball in the gym

choices: You ask Mr. Gomez if you can see the nurse
You run out of the gym
11211211.content:
As you are running down the court, you trip and fall to the floor. As you try to stand up, you notice your ears seem a little longer. Then, all of a sudden, your back starts to ache and you can't stand up straight. You also notice that your ears are now dangling from your head. They look big and floppy, like a dog's ears.

As you try to stand up, you feel a searing pain rip through your arms, shoulders, spine, hips, pelvis and legs. Unable to do anything you double over in pain. After a few moments, it starts to slowly recede until it was nothing more then a painful memory. Trying to stand up, you flop back to the ground.

Standing on all fours, you realize that you could no longer walk on two legs.

"Great," you think. "Now I have to walk around like a dog."
11211211.title: You fall on all fours

choices: You try to catch a ball with your mouth
While batting you gym shorts split open
1121122.content:
"Softball, great" you say. It's your favorite sport.

You run in and change into your gym uniform. Soon everyone is outside and taking turns hitting and fielding. It looks like it's going to be a good day after all. About halfway through class....
1121122.title: You are playing Softball outside

choices: You run back into the gym to change
You run and hide in some bushes
11211222.content:
Mr. Gomez, your gym teacher, tells you to take your turn at bat.

You pick up a bat and go to home plate. You get into your batting stance but something doesn't feel right. You feel an itch at the base of your spine. You start scratching but all that happens is it gets itchier and it soon starts to hurt. You try to ignore the feeling, but it is clearly a distraction as you miss the first few pitches that are thrown to you.

While Mr. Gomez gathers the softballs, you check it out and see a small bump at the top of your pants almost looking like a tail.

Your attention quickly returns to Mr. Gomez as he throws the next pitch. You make contact, but that's not what you are focused on. You hear a loud rip and turn around. You are shocked to see a huge tail at the end of your spine. The tail just went right through your pants and left a big hole there.
11211222.title: While batting you gym shorts split open

choices: Your neighbor comes over and takes you to her house
You run away and hide in some bushes
11212.content:
You hear your mom.

"Billy, you promised to mom the lawn when you got home." she said.

"OK, mom."

You toss the ring in your pocket, thinking you will take it back to the museum tomorrow.

You go outside and start up the lawn mower. You get approximately half way through mowing the front lawn when your hands start to stiffen. You eventually have to let go of the lawn mower.

You look down and notice your nails have fallen out. The tips of your fingers flare up in agony as tiny points tear through the top. The holes are small and tight enough that almost no blood comes out, but the pain is unbearable. It feels as if your very bones are pushing themselves out. As you stare dumbfounded, a swelling builds up in the skin surrounding each claw, and slowly spreads to the entire digit. The top joints of you fingers swell grotesquely while the rest simply shrinks into your knuckles. Your thumbs almost completely disappear; all that remains is a tiny little clawed nub. The palms of your hands swell as well, drying and cracking as they gain mass. They feel like leather pads.

The arches of your feet grow, more than doubling in length as the bones stretch your skin like a drum. Your pinky toes disappear as the others swell to become the same size as your fingers. You can't see the soles of your feet, but you can feel that they too are swollen and leathery.

You look down at your legs and gasp at how thick the hair is; it's practically fur! But why would you be growing fur? After a quick overlook, you realize your arms and the backs of your hands, now paws, are covered in the same fuzz, which feels like it is still growing, but that isn't possible.

A tickle at the base of your spine brings your attention back to your own body. Something is pressing its way out from the base of your spine. As it continues to grow, you realize what it was; a tail. You try to pull it back into yourself, but only succeed in making it stand at attention, as it ripped through your shorts.

Your hips pop loudly, which send you tumbling to the ground. You try standing again, still in a half-crouch. The vertebrae in your lower back each pop individually, sending your paws closer and closer to the ground. Your shoulders lock, and your hips pop and crack once more, this time for good. You fall four-on-the-floor and cringe as your back tenses.

Only your head remains human, but your ears are already changing. You groan and cry as they flatten and lengthen. Your skull splits and mends itself as it became flatter. Bones creak and snap in your face, and your teeth become thinner, longer and sharper. Your nose becomes black and slimy. Your whiskers flare as you cringe again while your jaw lengthens. As it grows, your teeth jut forward menacingly.

Looking over your new body, you realize that you look very similar to your neighbor's poodle, Beauty.

You stand there, on all fours panting, trying to figure out what to do when...
11212.title: You put the ring back in you pocket

112121.content:
" Bad Dog!" is what you hear, as a collar and leash are attached to your neck. It is Margret, your neighbor. As she leads you into her backyard, she continues to yell at you.

"You know better that to leave our yard. Bad Dog!"

I am not a bad dog, you think, I am a good dog.
112121.title: Your neighbor comes over and takes you to her h...

1121212.content: What do you do outside?
1121212.title: She leaves you outside

choices: You notice that dogs are following you
11213.content: You look at the clock and realize it's getting late. You still haven't done your nightly jog. You go outside and do some stretches to warm up your muscles. After about 10 minutes of stretching you start running. Everything is going well until...
11213.title: You leave the ring on and head outside.

choices: You go back to your house
You go to your neighbor's house
112131.content:
As you are running you feel some pressure on your rear cause a sharp pain. Almost unconsciously, you feel around to your butt, rubbing above it. What you feel causes your heart to jump. A bump. A large, tender bump above your butt. As you glance back you see some sort of fleshy growth, maybe and inch long. “A tail!” you whispered to yourself, “I’m growing a tail!” You watch as the tail continues to grow and a large ball of white fur grows on the tip.

Suddenly, your chest starts to hurt. The pain in your ribs becomes unbearable. You feel short of breath, and start to hyperventilate. As you suck in the air, you actually can hear your ribs beginning to crack. You can feel them expanding outward and look down. In a panic, you lift up your shirt and look down. Your ribcage is expanding before your eyes! And your abs are pulling even tighter, further exaggerating the look of your expanded chest. You feel your expanded chest. It feels heavy to keep upright – it’s weight and shape are clearly intended to force you forward, to force you to all fours! Finally, it seems to stop.

You pause for a moment and remember the ring on you finger. You wonder if that could be causing the transformation. No matter what caused it, you realize you need to get home as soon as possible.

You continue running as your thighs start to change shape, thicker at the top, but too thin at the bottom – too thin for a human, that is. Your hamstrings also start tightening too, as do your lower back muscles, forcing you into a hunching position. You feel the vertebrae in your back pop into position, one by one, each one sending hands closer and closer to the ground. Then you feel your Achilles tendons tightening, slowly, relentlessly conspiring to pull you heels up off the ground, to force you onto all fours!

As you land on all fours, it feels obscenely good. As you look over your body you are horrified at what you see - leaning on your hands like this, your expanded chest and tightened stomach make your shape look unmistakably canine.

You feel your nose hurting and jaw aching. You realize that something was happening to your face. Your nose starts to turn black! You feel a huge pressure from within your nose and jaw, and realize your face is starting to push out into a dog’s muzzle!

You look down at your arms, horrified to see white fur sprouting from your skin. Your hands are lengthening before your eyes as your fingers curl and shorten into mere paws.

Desperate, you attempt to lift off your shirt to witness the inevitable, but you only succeeded in tearing at your shirt with your new claws, your tattered shirt falling to the ground, leaving you completely naked. You look at your chest as the fur began to sprout all over your formerly perfect, smooth skin and over your shoulders as well. You also notice two rows of nipples lining your belly. You twist to get a glimpse of your back, only to see fur sprouting profusely there too, making you feel utterly bestial.

You cry out, “Howwwooorp merr, preeeasssee!” and realized he had practically howled, as your vocal chords are changing. The other dogs in the neighborhood howl in response.

You stop to look at your transformed body and are shocked to discover you look exactly like your neighbor's poodle, Beauty.
112131.title: Your body starts to ache

1121312.content: You run into your neighbor's backyard, and you notice that no dog is barking at you. You realize that you must have become Beauty! You look around and smell with your new nose, everything seems familar, yet strange. Then you hear someone coming outside, who is it?
1121312.title: You go to your neighbor's house

choices: Leads you to the kitchen for dinner
Takes you to the basement where your bed is
11213122.content:
As you look around, you see the back door open and notice Margret, Stacy's mom standing there.

"Come here, Beauty, come on!" she says.

Almost instinctively, you start to walk over to the back door. Margret opens the door and lets you inside the house. You take a look around and are impressed with all the fancy paintings and expensive furniture in the house.

"Here Beauty!" Margret calls again.

You follow the sound of her voice as she...
11213122.title: Stacy's mom Margret comes outside

choices: You look to get table scraps
112131221.content:
As your paws hit the white tiled floor, you smell it. The Dog Food. Margret sits at the table with her family. You walk over to the dog bowls, your mind racing. You reach the area of the dog food. You sniff it, and it doesn't smell half bad to you. You think about your situation, then look over to the table. You see Margret and Stacy, Margret's husband, whose name you believe is Jeff, and Stacy's younger sister, who looks to be anywhere between 8-10. You've never seen her, and are not sure of her name.

You hear a growling, and you know it is not you. You are hungry.
112131221.title: Leads you to the kitchen for dinner

choices: Takes you for your morning walk
Puts you in the car to go and see the vet
112131222.content:
Margret leads you down the stairs into the basement. It wasn't nearly as ornately decorated as the rest of the house. In fact it appeared to be unfinished storage space for the most part.

In the middle of the room was an area rug with a doggy bed and a couple of doggie bowls with some food and water. You lay down on the bed as comfortably as possible.

"Good Night, Beauty" Margret says as she shuts the basement door behind her.

It takes a while for you to get comfortable, but eventually you fall asleep. In the morning, Margret comes down the stairs and attaches a leash to your collar. She leads you up the stairs and...
112131222.title: Takes you to the basement where your bed is

choices: She is worried about where you are
She acts as if you never existed
1121312221.content:
As you walk out the door, you are sort of amazed at how our new body gives you a new veiw. You sniff the air, and smell things no human could poosibly imagine. You suddenly see your mom and start barking at her, trying to tell her who you really are.

"Beauty, shush! It's just Mrs. Sindal."

You obey Margret's command as Margret starts talking to you mom. How is your mom acting?
1121312221.title: Takes you for your morning walk

choices: You go to get help while trying to avoid the dogs
You wait until tomorrow to go outside again
112132.content:
As you run, you hear a lot of barking. You see that several dogs have started to follow you. They seem to be staying a few feet behind you. When you get to your property, you stop for a moment to catch your breath. The dogs catch up to you and start to jump all over you. You have fun rolling around with the dogs on the lawn.

You soon notice that all the dogs are male, but don't think that means much. Suddenly an odd tingling begins in your shorts centered in the crotch. All of the dogs start sniffing that area of your shorts. As a wave of lust flows through you. You start to feel extremely horny, like you would be if you were making out your girlfriend.

You are concerned about the odd tingling and the dogs reaction, so you quickly run into your house and lock the door behind you. You make your way up to the bathroom and close the door. You take off your clothes to make sure everything is OK.

Pulling off your shorts you are shocked to see your pubic hair had completely been replaced by white dog fur and that it had spread by a couple of inches. You search frantically for your manhood, but you cannot find it. Thick within the bushy hair, your fingers probed an unexpected slit where your manhood was.

You pick up a mirror to see if you can get a better look. You see the slit is already beginning to tighten into a circle and move closer to you butt. You are shocked to realize you have a bitch's anatomy.

Now you understand why you felt so strange around those dogs. Your body is now designed to mate with them and it appears you are in heat.
112132.title: You notice that dogs are following you

1121321.content:
You slowly stick your head out of the door and look around. Fortunately, you don't see any dogs. You head down the street and still no barking. You quickly gain confidence and walk faster, not noticing that the fur is spreading.

About a block away, a frenzied group of dogs, all large and male, begins barking and chasing after you. You run, and as you do you feel something growing out of your lower back. Turning, you see a tail sprouting.

You turn a corner and see...
1121321.title: You need some professional help!

11213211.content:
As you stare up at the alley wall, the barking gets closer. You try to turn around, ready to fend off the dogs, but your legs begin cracking, causing you to fall over.

You then realize that your feet are still on the ground, but so are your hands. You now have a dog's posture!

Turning your head, you see five large, strong dogs, all with hungry eyes. They look at you, tails wagging and slaver running from their jaws, and you...
11213211.title: Nowhere to run, nowhere to hide.

112132111.content: Without warning, your tail raises and you expose yourself to the excited hounds. The barking increases as they fight to be the first to mount you. Eventually, a large Great Dane stands above the others, demonstrating that he is the alpha male. This only serves to make you feel aroused. The gigantic dog stands over you and begins to thrust.
112132111.title: Dominance and Submission.

1121322.content:
You are feeling very tired, and even though you are off of work tomorrow, you need to catch up on your sleep. You jump into your bed, but there is something different about it. Instead of sleeping on your back like you normally do, you lay on your stomach. You instantly fall asleep.

When you wake up, for feel sort of odd. You try to stand, but for some reason, your body won't let you stand. This worries you. Suddenly, you have the urge to do your bussiness. Where do you go?
1121322.title: You wait until tomorrow to go outside again

You decide to walk around outside for a while
11213222.content:
You manage to get on your hands and knees and crawl out the back door. Maybe some fresh air will help, you think.

You crawl out to the middle of the lawn. Then you squat down and let your bladder empty itself. As you finished peeing, you stop in shock and fear. You look around embarrassed by your actions. You don't know what was going on, but you don't like it.

choices: Mom thinks you are her dog
Mom thinks you are owned by the neighbors and takes you there
112132221.content:
As you crawl back inside the house, you see your mom. You don't want Mom to she you like this, so you try to avoid her. Mom sees you and begins to pet you. You find this oddly comforting.

IT is obvious that Mom thinks you are a dog, but whose dog are you?
112132221.title: You crawl back inside your house

choices: You want to go to your neighbor's house
You want to go for a walk

choices: give the ring to your girlfriend
11223.content:
It's late at night, as you pull into your girlfriend, Lauren's driveway. You just got back from taking her to an exclusive event at the museum. It was a new history exhibit on famous Italian families.

"Would like to come in?" she asks.

"I'd love to." you respond.

As she unlocks the front door, a large golden retriever jumps up and starts licking her face.

"Down boy" Lauren says and the dog quickly obeys her commands.

"This is Rex, I've had him since I was a little girl. He's always there for me, and we cuddle together every night in my bed." she tells you. Lucky dog you think to yourself.

"How about something to drink?" she asks.

"That would be great." you respond.

"OK I'll be right back." she says as she walks into the kitchen. You sit down on the sofa in the living room. As you sit down, you hear a clink on the floor. You look down and are shocked to see a ring on the floor.

You pick the ring up and....
11223.title: Your Girlfriend owns the dog

choices: Your girlfriend comes back with the drinks
112231.content:
You notice an inscription on the ring.

"Incanis corpore transmuto" you say to yourself. Wondering what it could mean.
112231.title: read the inscription

choices: You girlfriend comes back into the room and sees you
You find somewhere to hide before your girlfriend comes back
1122311.content:
You begin to feel light headed. You barely have time to think when your hands are both hit with simultaneous painful cramps, and your lower back is assaulted by a viscous cramp as well.

You look down to see your hands are actually changing, your fingers shrinking in size in relation to your swelling palms. Then another terrible spasm hits your back, causing you to double over. When you try to stand back up straight, you find it very difficult to do - your back wants to stay bent.

Your mouth begins to ache as well, as does your face. Then, a tightness in your jeans causes you to pull them back from your butt, and what you see terrifies you beyond belief - a canine tail has started to push out from above your butt! When you try to stand back up again, a strong pain in you back sends you falling forward, you just manage to catch yourself on the arm of the sofa, keeping your newly forming paws from hitting the ground, remaining somewhat upright if still badly stooped over. The pain in your back is building by the moment. You can feel pressure in your rib cage and you know it is preparing to expand to make way for your newly forming canine organs.

At the same time, you stomach is tightening, getting ready to pull in to give you a canine abdomen. As you fight to remain standing, your body is assaulted with pain. You finally let up your struggle to stand momentarily, resting your weight on your two changing hands.

But it was too late, the weight of your expanding chest too much to bear, and you scream, "Noooo!" as you fall down to the ground, your weight resting on what now could only be called your front paws. Landing on all fours, your hip joints and lower vertebrae change, locking you into four legged position.

Catching a glimpse of yourself in a full-length mirror, your furry back, expanding chest and inhumanly thin stomach, you are struck by a terrible thought - you are now going to be just an animal - a pet!

The changes continue at a breakneck pace, your face pushes out, fur covering your features, your ears move all the way to the top of your furry head, your front arms turning all the way into front legs.

Looking at yourself in the mirror, you are terrified to see a fully canine face stare back, recognizable only by your eyes. Then a wave of change hit you rear legs, pulling them up, straightening them into their final four-legged position, fur covering them completely.

You look over yourself and are shocked to discover that you look exactly like your girlfriend's dog, Rex.
1122311.title: You start to feel strange

11223121.content: Immidiantly, a long flat tounge flaps out of your mouth and starts to slurp up the water. You realize what his happening, and with an odd look on your face, quickly puts the drink down. Did anybody see this?
11223121.title: You lap it up with your tounge

choices: A cute girl owns the dog
1123.title: German Shepherd

11233.content:
It is Friday afternoon, and you are walking home from a long day at school. You are counting down the days to the end of the semester. You are really looking to the summer and spending some time with your friends.

Only the horn of a large truck brings you back to reality. You look up and see the truck only a few feet in front of you. Fortunately you are able to get out of the way as the truck turns the corner. Atlas Moving is written on the side of the van.

You watch as the truck turns down your street. You didn't realize anyone was moving. Then you remember the old farmhouse down the corner. It had been abandoned for several years.

As you approach the farmhouse, you notice a teenage girl walking into the house. She looks to be about your age. This could be a really fun summer you think to yourself. As you continue to walk home, you eye catches something glimmering on the ground. You reach down and pick it up. It's a ring.

Immediately you realize the ring would be a beautiful welcome gift for the new girl. It only needs to be cleaned up. You take it home and give it a good polish.

As you look it over you realize there is an inscription on it.

"Incanis Corpore Transmuto"

You don't think anything of it and place the ring on your nightstand. The next morning you wake up and
11233.title: A cute girl owns the dog

112331.content:
You grab the ring and throw it into your bag, hoping you will see the girl on you way home. The park you practice in is close to your house, so you walk to practice. The practice runs smoothly, as you, the star outfielder, have an excellent practice. As you walk home, just as you had hoped, the new girl is outside. You put down your bag.

"Hello, are you new to the area?"

The girl turns around, and smiles.

"Yes. My name is Amy Wilcox. And you are..."

"Wilby Daniels. I live a couple houses down."

"Nice to meet you Wilby. I'm actually busy looking for a ring I dropped, so...."

"I found a ring on my way home last night, it might be yours? I have it in my bag..."

You go to reach inside the bag and you pull out the ring.

"Is this it?"

"YES! Oh thank you! It has been in my family for hundreds of years. It is suppodidly cursed, you know."

"Is it?" You say with a smirk on your face. "Let me see."

She gives you the ring, and you put it on. You read the inspcription one more time.

"Incanis Copore Transmuto!"

All of a sudden, A large German Shepherd comes bursting out the door. It runs up to you and begins to lick your face as its tail wags at a great speed.

"Down Rusty! Sit!"

The dog obeys Amy's command.

"Well," You joke, " the curse must be getting attacked by a friendly dog!"

Amy chuckles and says "Yes, this is Rusty. He is a great dog."

You bend down and pet Rusty. Rusty pants happily.

"He is a beautiful dog."

"Would you like to come inside, Wilby?"
112331.title: Meeting the New Girl

choices: You go into her living room
1123311.content:
"I would love to, Amy. Let me grab my bag."

Amy leads Rusty inside as you go to grab your bag. An odd chill comes over, which is out of place considering how hot the sun has been. You dismiss it and head inside.

Where do you go once inside?
1123311.title: You accept to go inside

11233111.content: Amy is sitting beautifly on the couch, with Rusty laying beside her, panting like any normal dog should. You sit next to Amy. Rusty runs off into the next room as the two of you begin to talk.
11233111.title: You go into her living room

choices: You start by pulling some weeds in the garden
112332.content:
You wake up the next morning, hoping to enjoy a nice Saturday to yourself, but your Father comes in to your room. He's in the landscaping business and expects you to give him a hand on the busy weekends.

Begrudgingly you crawl out of bed and get dressed. You grab a quick bite to eat as your dad loads up his truck. You run out the door and hop in as he pulls out of the driveway. Much to your surprise, it isn't a long drive. You just go down the street.

You are at the old farmhouse, where the cute girl moved in. Maybe this would be your chance. You reach into your pocket and find the ring. As you look at it an eerie glow emanates from the jewel in the center.

"Wow, this is a really special ring. I sure hope she likes it." you think to yourself.
112332.title: You go to your job

The new neighbors from France own the dog
121.title: Yes

1211.content:
You pull into the driveway, shut the car off, and head towards your door. There was an interesting exhibit at the museam about Midevel "magic." You didn't believe a thing about the exhibit, but it did have some interesting concepts. You were very interested in the Jewelry, and as you think of this, you open the door and your big, lumbering, old english sheepdog Snowy is right there waiting for you. You are very excited to see it and as you pet her, you think about her life. You wish in your head that you could see life from her veiw. Suddenly, a clank sound catches your ear. You look down to see a ring. You pick it up and put it on. You notice the inscription.

"Incanis Corpore Transmuto," you say to yourself.

It must be from the exhibit, you think. No matter, you can return it tomorrow.
1211.title: You own the dog

12112.title: You head to the kitchen

choices: You eat the dog food at the table
You eat the dog food while on the floor
121121.content: Without even thinking, you grab a can of Snowy's Dog Food. Taking the can opener, you open the can and plop it into Snowy's food bowl. You sniff the food, and your mind can't wait to eat it. But where to you eat it?
121121.title: Dog Food

1211212.content: You set the food on the floor, then get down on all fours. You sniff the food one more time, then plop your face into it. You quickly eat the entire bowl, and lick it clean. Your tounge is incredibly long now, and you begin to pant.
1211212.title: You eat the dog food while on the floor

choices: You run to the sink and try to wash out your mouth
It tastes good, so you reach for another one
121122.content:
You reach in the cabinet to grab a granola bar. Just a little something to keep you going until dinner. Without looking, you rip open the wrapper and take a bite.

As you chew, you can't help buy notice that this bar has a peculiar taste. It doesn't taste like oats or grains. In fact, it tastes a lot like meat.

You look down and realize that you aren't eating a granola bar. You grabbed a dog treat.
121122.title: Dog Treats

choices: White fur creeps up your hands
You try to get up, but can't
1211222.content: You, for some reason, find the treat appealing and begin to eat more. As you continue to eat the treat, you begin to feel a little strange. You then drop a treat, and you immidiantly get down on all fours and eat the treat off the ground. As you eat the treat...
1211222.title: It tastes good, so you reach for another one

choices: The rich people next door own it
Your best friend across the street owns it
1221.title: Golden Retriver

choices: You feel a strange sensation run through your body
12213.content:
Its been a long day for you. You were given a history assignment in school and went to the museum with your best friend to do some research. After searching for a while, you discover the history of the Borgia family. The museum curator allows you to have a look at some of the rare artifacts they have regarding the family, including an interesting ring. You soon hear your friend telling you that it getting late and you have to go.

You drive back toward your house and pull into the driveway. Stacy thanks you for the ride and walks across the street to her house. Her mom opens the door and her Golden Retriever, Misty, comes running out the front door. Misty jumps up on Stacy and starts licking her face. Stacy then pulls Misty back inside.

As you walk into your house, you can help but think how much fun it would be to have a dog of your own. You've tried talking to your parents about getting a dog, but your Mom thinks keeping one is too much work.

Since it's getting late you go up to your room and toss your backpack on your desk. As you look over the information you got from the museum, you see the ring. You must have left in such a hurry you forgot to give it back to the curator.

You put it on and look at it. You notice the inscription.

"incanis corpore transmuto"
12213.title: Your best friend across the street owns it

choices: You decide to lay in bed hoping this is all a bad dream
You get out of the house and explore the neighborhood
122131.content:
You think back to what the museum curator told you. There was a curse placed on the ring, but no one knew exactly what the curse was.

Suddenly the tingling sensation hits your ears. You lift a hand and touch your ears, the right, then the left, feeling that they are becoming long and floppy, with a light coating of fuzz now covering them.

Fur starts to poke through your skin along the sides of your face and neck, a brushing feeling that was almost…pleasant. A slight sting enters your eyes, very briefly, as the fur started to cover your face. A black smudge touches your nose. You wonder where the smudge could have come from.

"NO", You yell as you realize, your nose itself is turning black!

Cracks and jolts rock your face as your mouth pushes outward into a dog’s muzzle, quickly becoming covered in soft golden fur. Your teeth sharpen, into fangs, as your tongue lengthens further and further out with your muzzle. The human hair you have begins to fall out, falling gradually to the floor, to be replaced by the same fur that was invading the rest of your head.


" No, stop. Nogghhh." A lump forms in your throat. Your vocal chords are changing. " Ngghhh, Grrrrfff."

You shake your head with a huge effort and try once more to speak.

"Grrrrfff… Grrrr" Is the best you can manage.

You move a hand, or is it a paw? You no longer have hands, you think desperately. Not anymore. Your hands, paws, have changed, your fingers are shorter and your thumbs now a long way up your wrist, with short black claws protruding out. Leathery pads have developed on your palms.

"My-help me!" You try to call out, but could only make a high-pitched whine.

You slash your right paw down your shirt tearing the garment off your body. You are horrified to find thick golden fur covering almost all of you chest and back. Pressure builds up at the base of your spine, an uncomfortable pulling sensation.

No, not that, you thought, not a tail!

You fell to the floor, crawling hysterically out of your jeans as the pressure of your changing hips and legs becomes too much to bear, using your newly formed forepaws to drag yourself along. You watch, panting, as your new tail grows at an astonishing rate, snaking out until it lay on your backside. God, you could feel the thing sitting there.

Embarrassment flushes your mind as the fur grew across your hips. Bone crack across your legs as they become thinner, differently jointed, suited to the rest of your body. Your feet creak and you are pushed up on to your toes, on to all fours like the animal you know you are becoming. Leathery pads invade the bottom of you altering feet, while fur grow on the few patches of skin that still remained bare. You tried to stand, strained to get up, but clumsily fell back on to you four legs.

Then the changes stop. You look over your golden-furred body, at your tail, your four paws, at your black nose, which is always in your vision.

A golden retriever. That is what you are. Not human anymore, not physically at least.

In fact you look a lot like Misty, Stacy's dog.

"Let me out! Let me out of this, please! I don’t want to be an animal!" you try to scream.

" Grrrr ahoooo." You howl, vainly attempting to call out for help.
122131.title: You feel a strange sensation run through your body

choices: Your room has changed to suit your new form
1221311.content:
You lay in bed hoping this is all a bad dream. Eventually you fall asleep.

Early the next morning, you hear the alarm clocking ringing. You groggily wake up, but something doesn't feel right. You open your eyes and as your vision clears, you stare in shock down your long muzzle and see your hind legs, paws, rump and tail. Your body feels strange.

You jump out of bed and look around, only to realize....
1221311.title: You decide to lay in bed hoping this is all a b...

12213111.content: You look around the room, who's room is it?
12213111.title: You are in Stacy's house

choices: There is a knock on your door
You try to sneak out of the house
12213112.content:
Early the next morning you wake up. As you open your eyes you hope for just a moment that you would wake up as your normal self, but when you see your own paws pushing you up to a swatting position you let go of that dream.

As you look around your room, you notice a number of things have changed. Where there was once a queen-sized bed, now sits a large doggy bed with the name Misty embroidered on it.

You quickly run over to your dresser and put your front paws on top to keep your balance. Staring back at you is the reflection of a golden retriever. As you look over your dresser you are shocked to discover other changes. Your collection of bracelets and necklaces has been replaced by leashes and collars.

All of the photos on your dresser have changed as well. Photos of you with your friends and family, now have a golden retriever in your place.

You try to convince yourself that it can't be true, but everything around you has changed to make it appear that you have always been a dog.
12213112.title: Your room has changed to suit your new form

122131121.content: You pick up the scent of the person at the door, who is it?
122131121.title: There is a knock on your door

choices: She acts as if you have always been a dog
1221311212.content: Mom opens the door and sees you sitting there, panting. What is her reaction?
1221311212.title: Your Mom

choices: For you to go to the bathroom!"
12213112122.content:
"Hows my good little girl this morning? You are such a good girl! Yes you are!"

For a second, you are confused, but suddenly, a wave of happiness flows through your body, and you pant and wag your tail. You jump up onto your Mom's shoulders and lick her face.

"Down, Misty, Down!" Your mom says with a chuckle.

You instantly obey your Mom's command! Mom heads into your room and grabs you a collar. She puts it on you, and you suddenly realize what you just did. But when Mom pats you on the head, you begin to pant and wag your tail again.

"Come, Misty, it is time...
12213112122.title: She acts as if you have always been a dog

choices: Mom takes you for a walk
122131121222.content:
Expecting to be lead to the bathroom, you are sort of surprised when Mom leads you out the front yard. But then you realize: You are now a dog, and the world is your bathroom. You sniff around, trying to find a good place to poop. Evenutally, you squat down and push the good stuff out.

"Good Girl Misty!" Mom says as she pick it up. You pant with happiness as you try to fight your new instincts
122131121222.title: For you to go to the bathroom!"

choices: Yes, you sneak out the front door
122131122.content: Are You sucessfull in sneaking out?
122131122.title: You try to sneak out of the house

choices: You make it to the museum
1221311222.content:
You slowly make your way down the stairs, hoping no one will see or hear you. Fortunately the front door is open, so you are able to sneak out without anyone noticing.

As you exit the front door, you start to run as fast as you can. You get up on your feet and continue your escape. Your body is rapidly filled by new power, you feel stronger and you run faster. Everything feels great until you realize that you now run on all fours with four newly developed paws. No, no, no, oh god, no you think as this realization fills your mind. But you continue running, even though it probably won’t matter much, it looks like you will be a dog forever.
1221311222.title: Yes, you sneak out the front door

choices: Your Mom tells you it's time for school
Your Mom tells you breakfast is ready
122132.content:
You go to bed nude and fall into a deep sleep. During the night you have strange dreams. Your dreams drift from human activities to chasing rabbits in an open field. Normally you would dream about your boyfriend, but images of him are replaced with big muscular dogs.

The next morning, you wake up early, your sleep uncomfortable. You are lying on your back, and it feels like there was something in the bed right under your lower back. You roll over and feel the mattress, but it is perfectly smooth. You slide yourself on to your back again, and fell the same pressure. This time you glide your hand directly up from your ass to your back to feel what could be under you. Again, you fell nothing but soft sheets—but as you sweep up, the back of your hand fells a small nub just above your butt. It also seems like there is a fine coat of hair on your back.

You jump up from the bed in panic and look at your naked body in the mirror. You almost break down in tears as you look at yourself. Your face looks almost normal, but there is a slight elongation to the shape of your skull, your ears are almost imperceptibly pointy at the tops, and your nose was just slightly longer than normal-- and worse, there was a small dark spot, slightly wet, at the tip.

As you gasp in despair you can see your teeth. Your canines had become more, well, canine. They are noticeably elongated.

But the real problem is your body. Your feet and lower legs have thinned noticeably, your toenails are black, and fine golden hair is growing thickly from your ankles, thinning as it comes up your legs and up your back to your shoulders, which are also flatter and more narrow. Your hands, too, have become slightly misshapen, your fingernails thick and black, thin hair growing on the backs. Your chest is flatter than normal, and six little spots—almost like large blisters or boils, but painless— have sprouted in two rows down your torso. You recognize these spots from all the times you have rubbed Misty's belly--they are the beginnings of canine teats.

You sit down and cry for a while as you look at your deformed body.

"What's happening to me?" you cry.
122132.title: You go to sleep

1221321.content:
"HONEY, IT'S TIME TO GET READY FOR SCHOOL!"

You think about school. What if others notice your deformations? What if you continue to change? On the other hand, your mom won't just let you not go to school, and you do have a big review for a test today. What do you decide to do?
1221321.title: Your Mom tells you it's time for school

12213212.content:
You get dressed quickly, choosing clothes to hide your deformities. You put on jeans and a loose blouse, then tried to find shoes that would work with your partially canine feet. You seem best able to walk in high heels-- as you notice you have small black pads on the bottom of your smaller feet, and the elongated, tip-toe nature of your new walk would not work with flats. You put on thick stockings and stuffed the toes with tissues to better fill the shoes.

Next you go to the mirror and put foundation on, paying special attention to the black on the tip of your nose. Now you noticed that your lips have thinned too, so you put heavy lipstick on them to make them seem fuller. You brush your hair over her ears and put on big sunglasses, then carefully and slowly made you way downstairs and outside.

You make it to the bus stop and no one seems to notice anything different. You have a normal uneventful ride to school. You enter the building and head toward your first class....
12213212.title: You get ready for school

choices: You start to feel really warm
The bell rings and class ends
122132122.content:
In your rush to get to class, you run into another student and drop you books. As you bend over to pick up your books, you hear something tear. At the same time, you feel something moving around in your pants. You throw your hands behind you. They grope around and find that the lump that was there earlier has grown.

You look around at the bustling crowd of students and duck into the nearest bathroom. You enter a stall and close the door before pulling down you jeans.

You are shocked to discover a half-foot tail poking through your panties. It is covered covered in golden brown fur.

"Okay," you say as pull up your jeans over your new tail. "As long as the changes stay inside my clothes, I'll be fine." You exit the stall and start heading toward your classroom.

You arrive at the classroom just as the bell rings and quickly take your seat. Throughout class, you feel really uncomfortable. You can't quite sit right, as your tail keeps constantly getting in the way.

A light fur starts growing on your waistline and it is incredibly itchy. You keep scratching at it. Luckily, it didn't seem to be creeping up your stomach at this point.
122132122.title: Biology

choices: You try to make it through the rest of the day
You try to find a way to sneak out of school
1221321221.content:
The longer you sit in the classroom the hotter you feel, partly out of frustration and partly due to the temperature. Your tongue has trouble staying in your mouth, which has caused a few dribbles on your top.

After a half hour you can't take it anymore, and ask the teacher if you can use the restroom. You run out of the classroom as fast as you can toward the restroom. You must be tired from the sprint, because you can't catch your breath, and you keep panting.

You let out a scream when you look at your face. Your nose has become dark and wet, and your ears have turned long and floppy, with golden brown fur covering them. Your tongue has elongated, and you are continually panting.
1221321221.title: You start to feel really warm

choices: You go to see the school nurse
12213212211.content:
You decide you really don't have a choice and have to try to make it through the day. You go back to class and strangely no one says anything about your changes.

The next couple of classes go routinely. Finally, the bell rings after fourth period. It's time for lunch, and you get a chance to figure out what's going on.

Before you enter the cafeteria, you stop in the restroom again.

As you look in the mirror, you notice your face has a faint dusting of golden brown hair, going from your cheeks to under your ears and jawline. Your blond hair had turned golden brown, and has become much longer and shaggier. You seem to be brushing stray locks out of your face every ten minutes.

Your tail is a full two and a half feet long now, and quite thick. Beneath your shirt, your chest has completely furred up. Your back has golden brown hair beginning to grow, and it is just starting to spread to your shoulders.

"Noooooooooooooooooo" you howl.

With that, your nose starts turning black and extends outward, about two inches, forming into a dog's snout. You also felt a tingling on your stomach. You quickly grabbed your chest, and feel additional nipples forming below your still human breasts.

You realize something needs to be done. You don't want to be a dog for the rest of your life.
12213212211.title: You try to make it through the rest of the day

122132122111.content: You decide that if no one noticed them before, no one will notice it again. You take the chance and exit the restroom. No one says anything about your looks, so you head in line for food. As you wait, someone walks up to you, who is it?

He asks you out on a date for tonight
1221321221111.content:
Your boyfriend comes up to you in line. You are so happy to see him. You jump up and put you hands on his shoulders and start licking his face. Your tail is also wagging incredible fast.

"Hey, it's nice to see you too" he says as he scratches your head.

You quickly come to your senses and realize what you are doing. You calm yourself down and compose yourself.

"Hi honey, how are you doing?" you ask him.

"Pretty good, and yourself?" he says.

"Oh I'm OK" you respond not wanting to burden him with your problems.

The two of you get your food and...

12213212211111.content: Today's special is Spagetti. You also ordered a coke to help you wash it down. You lower your head and begin to sniff the food. You're glad that the food at your school is actually good, not like the gross food shown in TV Shows. Suddenly, forget your fork and just eat the food using only your mouth. With Marina Sauce all over your face, you move your head toward the Coke and let your tounge slurp up the drink.

1222.content:
Its been a long day for you. You were just dropped off by your friend Stacy from the museam. You know the curator and got a sneak peak at the new exibit "Magic through the Ages." You enter the house, and your Beagle, Peanut, greets you with a warm smile. You bend to pet him and you think how cool his life is. You walk past mom who is making diner for you. She talks to you.

"Can you go into the basement really quick and find Peanut a ball? He's been whining recently."

You oblige and head downstairs. You bend to look and you hear something hit the floor. It's a ring! You examine the ring, not knowing where it is from.You put it on and look at it. You notice the inscription.

"incanis corpore transmuto"

You realize that is was part of the exibit. You think that you will call the museam after dinner to tell the Curator, Mr. Jams, What happened. You repeat the phrase again, but you hear a rip come from behind you. You look and see a brown and white tail wagging! You don't know what just happened, but you now see the ball in the corner of the room. You think "What the hell is this?"

You quickly stuff the tail into your ripped pants as best as you can. Then you make your way up the stairs. As you walk through the kitchen, you can smell the wonderful food your mom is cooking and your tail starts to wag. You do your best to control it.

Your mom says "Dinner will be ready in about 15 minutes, honey."

You look back at her and....

122211.content:
"OK honey, just come when I call you!"

You begin to head upstairs. Where to you go?
122211.title: Tell her you are going upstairs to do some home...

1222112.content:
You enter the bathroom and lock the door behind you. You have to get a better look at yourself to understand what is going on. As you pull down your pants, you get a better look at the tail growing from your backside.

“Noooo, no it can’t be it’s a trick it can’t be real.” you try to convince yourself.

You begin to feel a strange tingling sensation across your body, then you feel a sudden hot flush followed by another pulse through your body. You begin to sweat as your body struggles to come to terms with its increased temperature. Then suddenly a throbbing pain begins in your hands, you look at them in horror as your carefully manicured fingernails fall out, within an instant they are replaced by black claws which pierce through the end of your fingers. You begin to cry out as you watch your fingers bloat and widen while your thumb retreats into your hand and moves around so that it now sits at your wrist. The skin on the palms of your hands begins to harden as it to swells, within moments your hands had been transformed into paws.

“Oh my god, oh my god, make it stop…please make it stop!” you cry.

Then a burst of pain hits your feet. First you feel a stretching sensation as the arches of your feet begin to lengthen until they seem to be almost twice their normal size. Your toenails fall out as they make way for the black claws that pierce through your skin. Your smallest toe disappears as the other four become enlarged. The mutation continues until your feet are no longer recognizable as anything other than paws. Suddenly you are forced onto your knees as more pain pulses through your shrinking hips and calves as they begin to change shape and reform themselves.

At the same time you feel a tremendous tightening across your chest as your rib cage begins to expand. With this expansion, your once plump breasts seem to flatten out until all that is left is your pert nipples. You feel a strange sensation as several new pairs of nipples push through your skin and line your belly. You try to raise yourself from the crouching position, but the wave of pain from your hips as they begin to shift prevents you from doing so.

You try again, but this time it seems as if your shoulders are collapsing, changing. You feel the vertebrae in your back pop into position, one by one, each one making your new form more and more permanent. Once complete you feel your hips make a final adjustment, and hear a loud popping sound, and with that your new body shape is locked into place.

You try to cry out, but find your human cries have been replaced by canine whines and howls. The changes then move to your head, which until now had remained unchanged. Your human teeth feel out as your new sharp, pointed canine teeth push through the gums of your lengthening jaw. Your skull seems to remold itself into its new shape. Your eyes increase in size and move further apart. As your human nose disappears to be replaced by a muzzle and black moist dog nose, you feel your human earlobes sink back into your head as your ear hole is pushed higher and new dog ears form. Finally you feel your neck stretch and lengthen and your neck bones reset themselves so that the position of you head has changed.

Suddenly you feel a strange itching sensation across your whole body as white and brown fur begins to burst through your skins pores. As the strange sensation continues your former human hair is forced from your head to make way for your new fur. Finally the sensations cease, the transformation was completed.

You look at your reflection. You are shocked by what she see, looking back at you is a Beagle, your Beagle Peanut, nothing of your former self remained.

you notice Peanut's bowl of dogfood on the floor

You decide to wait around the kitchen since it won't be long until dinner is ready. You watch you mom chop the vegetables and prepare the roast for dinner.

You are drooling not that you care any, as all you can seem to focus on is the plate of food. But a distant voice in your head tells you this is somehow wrong which brings confusion.

Suddenly the phone rings, bringing you back to reality. You mom goes over and answers the phone.

"Oh hi dear" she says. "How long until you'll be home?"

Your mom walks out of the room still talking to her husband on the phone.

Again the smell of food starts to overwhelm you. You
122212.title: You decide to hang around the kitchen

1222122.content:
You look at the bowl of dog food your mom left out for Peanut. And oddly enough the food looks really appetizing. You see little bits of what look like chicken and beef and turkey all mixed in a rather nice gravy. You begin to salivate and lick your lips. And as you do, you notice that your tongue has gotten flatter and that your lips have darked and taken on a ragged look. You feel a slight pressure in your nose. The pressure grows as your nose turns black and moist. And then you can smell again and you find out that you can smell things that you weren't aware of before. Now you can smell that delicious dog food lying in its' bowl before you.

You try to hang onto your humanity for a bit more. But all it takes for you to give in and accept the change is the sound of your stomach growling. You salivate some more and lick your blackened flews. And you pant contentedly.

You awkwardly get onto all fours and lean down toward the dog food bowl. You pick up some of the dog food in your mouth and try chewing some of it. You eyes widen and you can feel your ears perk up in surprise. The food before you might be dog food, but it is very tasty dog food. You find yourself liking the taste of dog food. You lower your head down again into the dog food bowl. And you begin to happily wolf it down.

The face looking back at you gets you whimpering like a pup: a soft, small coat of fur covering most of your face, in a combination of white patches the center of your face, surrounded by brown. Your nose has gone completely black, cold, and wet. You huddle yourself in the corner of the kitchen, cradling yourself, trying to convince yourself that it is nothing more than a very bad nightmare, but between your whimpering and your nails scraping across the floor, you aren’t doing a good job.

You ears are now long and floppy and had moved to the top of your head, and your face had changed - your nose is blackening, and you can feel a pressure on your nose and mouth. You realized that your face is starting to push out into a muzzle!
"What's happening to me?!" you ask yourself.

You arrive home from a date at the museam with your boyfriend, Jake. As you enter your house, you hear the St Bernard from next door, Madison, barking at you. You just ignore it. You never minded her, but your Mom hates dogs, for no apparent reason. Your home is empty, as your mom went out that night as well. You feel around your purse for the keys and find instead a ring. It must be from the exibit you saw tonight. You put it on, grab your keys, and head inside.

You begin to feel odd. Something's not right in your body. All of a sudden...

info.description: This story is based on the 1959 version of Disney's The Shaggy Dog (Not the crappy remake version). Except it can be either gender and any dog! Happy Transforming!
